{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wireless N LAN USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.patriotmemory.com/product/detail.jsp?prodline=6&catid=69&prodgroupid=163&id=1198&type=20 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Patriot Memory |model = PCUSBW1150 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 14, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Patriot_Memory_PCUSBW1150 |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = micro dongle |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PANWL6200V1 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188CUS; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = CC&C |manuf_model = WL-6200-V1 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/27/2010 |estreldate = 02/07/2012 |price = |upc = 815530013228 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B007JRC95Q |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The [http://www.patriotmemory.com/product/specs/mini-wifi.pdf Spec sheet] says "Compatible with Patriot Memory Alpine Media Player or any other desktop/laptop systems." Some users online have been unable to use this adapter with the Patriot Memory Box Office Media Player.
[http://www.patriotmemory.com/software/wireless/WirelessN_CD_150Mbps.zip Direct link] to the driver for this adapter from Patriot Memory. [[Category:English Documentation]]
